eraseBarriers.title: Erase omnichannel barriers with centralized operations
eraseBarriers.content: The way people shop has changed dramatically. Discover how effective omnichannel tools can help you create a consistent brand experience wherever you sell.

items.title: Manage omnichannel from one centralized platform
contents: Manage a consolidated inventory and simplify order management across all retail and e-commerce touchpoints with ease.
Create and customize product information (including category, price) across all of your channels from one place, rather than performing updates manually.

items.title: Bridge online-offline shopping experience
contents: Maximize the value of your retail stores by building a cohesive purchasing experience, whether your customers are online or offline.
IChiba OnePlatform transforms disparate data into a unified and seamless data system on both online and offline stores, which helps businesses easily make informed decisions.

items.title: Personalize promotions for diverse product portfolio
contents: Centrally manage multiple complex promotions, offer discounts, pre-booking options, and even omnichannel flash sales for your various product lines.
Provide relevant recommendations based on what customers search and purchase history.

items.title: Integrate stores and Saas ecosystem for complete retail supply management
contents: Integrate and manage multiple online stores, physical shops, warehouses and a comprehensive ecosystem within a single platform.
Get anywhere, anytime access to your business data to keep track of the sales and make changes as all data is stored in a single integrated system.

items.title: Provide cross-channel customer support
contents: Give customers various options to reach out, including email, phone, live chat, social media, eCommerce, and so on.
Gather data to determine how to approach each consumer across channels and provide them with personalized communications throughout the customer journey.

items.title: Understand audience by global insights and reports
contents: Consolidate real-time data from omnichannel so that you can have complete visibility over sales performance and customer behaviors.
Analysis about competitors and potential threats such as brand recognition, reputation, and overall quality to give better strategy.

items.title: Centralized auto-sync inventory
contents: Avoid over or under-selling products and maintain accurate inventory levels with a centralized inventory system that updates in real-time, free of errors.
Send automated alerts when inventory levels fall below a certain threshold or to prepare for peak season.
